plentry.pd: (0): No error.
(1): A general error with unspecified reason. Please retry the method.
(2): Invalid parameter. For example, the channel name contains illegal characters. Please reset the parameter.
(3): SDK is not ready. Possible reasons include: initialization failed; method called before joining a channel; or called before leaving the channel; audio module is disabled; incomplete program.

(4): does not support the request. Possible reasons include incorrect built-in encryption mode setting or SDK failed to load external encryption library. Please check the encryption mode setting or reload the external encryption library.
(5): Request is refused. Possible reasons include: initialization failed; channel name is empty when joining; channel name already used when calling to join multiple channels.
(6): Buffer size is too small to store returned data.
(7): Method is called before is initialized. Please ensure the object is initialized before calling the method.
(8): Invalid state.
(9): No access permission. Please check whether the app has obtained audio/video device permissions.
(10): Request timed out. Some API calls require the SDK to return execution results. If no result is returned within 10 seconds, this error is triggered.
(11): Request is canceled. This error is for internal use only and is not returned to the application via any method or callback.
(12): Method is called too frequently. This error is for internal use only and is not returned to the application via any method or callback.
(13): SDK failed to bind network socket. This error is for internal use only and is not returned to the application via any method or callback.
(14): Network is unavailable. This error is for internal use only and is not returned to the application via any method or callback.
(17): Join channel request is rejected. Possible reasons include: user is already in the channel; is called without calling before joining the channel.
(18): Leave channel failed. Possible reasons include: user already left the channel before calling leaveChannel; leaveChannel is called before joining the channel.
(19): Resource is already in use.
(20): Request is aborted by the SDK, possibly due to too frequent requests.
(21): initialization failed and crashed, possibly due to specific Windows firewall settings.
(22): SDK failed to allocate resources, possibly due to excessive use of system resources by the app or insufficient system resources.
(102): The specified channel name is invalid. Possible reason is incorrect parameter type. Please use a valid channel name to rejoin the channel.
(103): Failed to obtain server resources in the specified region. Try using another region when initializing .
(109): The current Token has expired. Please request a new Token from the server and call the method.

(110): Invalid Token. Common reasons include:
App certificate is enabled in the Agora console, but App ID is still used for authentication in code. When App certificate is enabled, the project must use Token for authentication.
The uid used to generate the Token is inconsistent with the uid used to join the channel.
(111): Network connection is interrupted. After the connection is established, if the client instance is disconnected from the server for more than 4 seconds, the SDK triggers this callback.
(112): Network connection is lost. After disconnection, if the client instance fails to reconnect to the Agora edge server within 10 seconds, this error is triggered.
(113): User is not in the channel when calling the method.
(114): Data size exceeds 1 KB when calling the method.
(115): Data bitrate exceeds 6 KB/s when calling the method.
(116): More than five data streams are created when calling the createDataStream(int* streamId, const DataStreamConfig& config) method.
(117): Data stream transmission timed out.
(119): Failed to switch role. Please try rejoining the channel.
(120): Media stream decryption failed. The user may have joined the channel with an incorrect password. Please check the entered password or advise the user to rejoin the channel.
(121): Invalid user ID.
(122): Data stream decryption failed. The user may have joined the channel with an incorrect password. Please check the entered password or advise the user to rejoin the channel.
(123): User is banned by the server.
(130): SDK does not support pushing encrypted streams to CDN.
(1001): Failed to load media engine.
(1005): A general error occurred (no specific reason). Please check whether the audio device is occupied by another app or try rejoining the channel.
(1008): Error occurred while initializing playback device. Please check whether the playback device is occupied by another app or try rejoining the channel.
(1009): Error occurred while starting playback device. Please check the playback device.
(1010): Error occurred while stopping playback device.
(1011): Error occurred while initializing recording device. Please check the recording device or try rejoining the channel.
(1012): Error occurred while starting recording device. Please check the recording device.
(1013): Error occurred while stopping recording device.
(1501): Camera access permission is not granted. Please check whether camera permission is granted.
